fault-code.cause: CDP Master failed to receive spectral results from CDP Node(s).
fault-code.problem-description: CDP Master failed to receive spectral results from CDP Node(s).

fault-code.cause: CDP Master failed to receive channel average results from CDP Node(s).
fault-code.problem-description: CDP Master failed to receive channel average results from CDP Node(s).

fault-code.cause: CDP Master failed to transmit spectral data to the ARCHIVE_CORR_DISTRIBUTOR
fault-code.problem-description: CDP Master failed to transmit spectral data to the ARCHIVE_CORR_DISTRIBUTOR. Perhaps this component has failed.

fault-code.cause: CDP Master failed to transmit channel average data to the ARCHIVE_CORR_DISTRIBUTOR
fault-code.problem-description: CDP Master failed to transmit channel average data to the ARCHIVE_CORR_DISTRIBUTOR. Perhaps this component has failed.

fault-code.cause: CDP Master has failed to send end-of-subscan information to DataCapturer.
fault-code.problem-description: CDP Master has failed to send end-of-subscan information to DataCapturer.
